text.section: The Frederick County Board of License Commissioners may issue a stadium on-sale license to the owner of any professional baseball team franchise, whether the franchise is a partnership, corporation, or limited liability company.
The annual fee for the stadium on-sale license is $2,000.

Except for a manufacturer or distributor of beer who is conducting business with the licensee for purposes of this section, the licensee may not permit any person to:
Carry any alcoholic beverages onto the licensed premises; or
Carry any alcoholic beverages from the licensed premises.
